title: Massage Gel
description: The cream is enriched with micro encapsulated granules of Orange extract with Enzyme rich Papaya base.
advantages: (-) Papaya and Orange has vitamin A and C which is good for skin.
(-) It prepares your skin for the entire day and keeps it fresh and glowing.
(-) It imparts the soothing effect that our skin hungers during summer.
(-) It can also be used as a prime before the make up.
(-) The moisture rich base provides excellent massaging improving blood circulation in the epidermis thereby adding radiant glow to the skin.
how-to-use: Cleanse your face and place a tiny amount of gel onto your ring finger and dab the gel onto your face and neck in small dots.
Massage it on your face and neck in an upward direction.
Gently massage the gel into your skin using small, upward, circular motions. Never drag downward on your skin.
Be sure to leave half inch margin around your eyes as this area is very sensitive.
Massage your face until the gel is absorbed. Wash your face with lukewarm water.
